page.title: 13Events
page.content: We have made several visits around the area researching for the Domesday project.{ {____________ {LOCAL NEWS There is great concern in the village about the safety of school children as they go to and from school.There is no pavement outside school and no warning to traffic.A decision to find a solution will be made on June 11th 1985.The delay has partly been caused by concern over the{nightingales}who breed in trees which grow on the section of land proposed to be used to widen the road.Nature Conservationists are worried about this and have protested to the council,also the Clay Cutters Arms which depends on through traffic for trade will lose business if the road is closed.
